excerpt: "A new artificial intelligence (AI) system that lets robots perform 10,000 scientific experiments a day has been developed by researchers from the University of Michigan. The BacterAI system promises to expedite the time frame for discovery in fields like medicine, agriculture and environmental science, for instance."
